p.k: Drama Turkey (2014). Hrají: Pinar Goktas, Munibe Millet, Gokay Muftuoglu. Režie: Levent Cetin.
p.d: In an operation during his military duty, Emrah (21) has killed a guerilla and found a notebook with a letter in it. Back to his home, he starts a search to find the recipient of the letter, while losing himself in his inner world.
